column5: Stop whining is a great start. After that relax and stay in your house for the next year. You should be set üëçüèº

Absolutely. My partner is a very buttoned up, corporate hard to read type and this is a constant challenge for me.

Absolutely! I think I‚Äôve broken up with my boyfriend about 20+ times now in a two year relationship. We‚Äôre still together currently, it‚Äôs just that every time we fight I catastrophize that this will always be like this and I can‚Äôt be in a relationship with someone who causes me that much pain therefore I must end it. 

It‚Äôs so frustrating knowing that emotionally this is how I feel, yet logically knowing that I don‚Äôt want to break up with him and this is the bpd side of me talking. Unfortunately the cycle creates a ton of instability for us both in our relationship which then tends to lead to more fights and the cycle repeats itself. 

Would love to hear anyone‚Äôs thoughts on how to stop this :/

DAE have a hard time believing their FP when they apologize?
